reviewText: This program I wasn't sure I'd EVER get to see until I found it here. I was just as pleased with the program's coverage on the Nissan 300ZX, all those Ferraris and those Kaminari custom car bodies as I was with the other Exotic Cars Of The World tape on the Cobras, slant nosed Porsches and CarTech Turbo Mustang. Although the tape wasn't fully rewound when it arrived on my doorstep, it didn't dampen my enthusiasm for this woefully underrated mini-series.
